caption.p:
Spatial distribution of JJAS mean: ( a) Surface Air Temperature in (i) MERRA, (ii) CESM1-CAM5, (iii) FGOALS-g2, (iv) CESM1-CAM5 anomaly and (v) FGOALS-g2 anomaly plots and ( b) Precipitation in (i) TRMM, (ii) HadCM3, (iii) GISS-E2H, (iv) HadCM3 anomaly, (v) GISS-E2H anomaly over the monsoon region. Figure is created using the NCAR/NCL
52 software version 6.3.0, URL: https://www.ncl.ncar.edu and Indian boundary data was downloaded from http://www.naturalearthdata.com/downloads in December 2013.
